entry.title: Explosion Kills Ukrainian POWs Held by Russian-Backed Forces
entry.content: An explosion at a detention camp in Russian-held territory in eastern Ukraine killed numerous Ukrainian prisoners of war, according to Ukrainian and Russian authorities, who blamed each other for the attack.

entry.title: Israel Is Investing in East Jerusalem, Generating Opportunity---and Anger
entry.content: The nation is seeking to cement control over majority-Arab area after years of neglect, adding new schools, roads, garbage trucks and jobs programs. Many Palestinian residents say the campaign is physically and culturally forcing them out.

entry.title: China's Xi Promotes Team of Allies to Influential Posts, Fortifying His Power
entry.content: President Xi Jinping has put people in position to run law enforcement and propaganda as he gets ready to claim a third term.
